# GitHub Secrets Setup for Signed APK Builds

## Required GitHub Repository Secrets

Go to: `https://github.com/OneEyedManLabs/audiotag/settings/secrets/actions`

Add these 4 secrets:

### 1. KEYSTORE_BASE64
```

```

### 2. KEYSTORE_PASSWORD
```
AudioTag2025!
```

### 3. KEY_ALIAS
```
audiotag
```

### 4. KEY_PASSWORD
```
AudioTag2025!
```

## How to Add Secrets

1. Go to GitHub repository settings
2. Click "Secrets and variables" â†’ "Actions"
3. Click "New repository secret"
4. Add each secret with exact name and value above

## Security Notes

- These secrets are encrypted and only accessible to GitHub Actions
- Never log or echo these values in workflow output
- Rotate passwords regularly for production apps
- Monitor secret access in repository audit logs

## Testing

After adding secrets, GitHub Actions will:
- Automatically sign release APKs when tags are pushed
- Store keystore securely during build process
- Clean up temporary files after build

## Manual Verification

To verify the signing worked:
```bash
# Download APK from GitHub release
# Check it installs properly on device
# Verify certificate matches your keystore
```
